name: Cupa-Vino
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

Sempli’s hand-blown wine glasses were created after Swedish designer, and Sempli owner, Daniele Semeraro realized that the stem on a traditional glass was aesthetically and technically superfluous. As an alternative, Semeraro designed these Cupa wine glasses. Made from lead-free crystal, their unique stemless construction creates a swirling rotation when set down—which assists the oxygenation of the wine. Enhance the sensory experience of enjoying a glass of your favorite vino. This glass also lends itself perfectly for a refreshing cocktail like a Mojito or Singapore Sling!

Set includes two wine glasses in an elegant gift box. 
•	Designer: Daniele 'Danne' Semeraro
•	Brand: Sempli
•	Material: Lead free crystal
•	Color: Clear
•	Measurements: H 4.25” W 3.75” D 3.75”
•	Care: Hand wash

name: Cupa-Rocks
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

This set of two hand blown Cupa tumblers can enhance the sensory pleasure of drinking brandy or whiskey. The contemporary glasses create a swirling rotation when set down, which assists the oxygenation of your fine spirit and promotes an aromatic experience for the drinker. Constructed to fit perfectly in your hand, the glass naturally works to warm your beverage. Made of lead-free crystaland inspired by Swedish and Italian design, these stunningly styled tumblers were featured in Esquire’s signature space, Esquire House LA 2010.

Set includes two tumblers in an elegant gift box. Filling to the edge measure 6cl—considered the “perfect pour” for whiskey or brandy. 
•	Designer: Daniele 'Danne' Semeraro
•	Brand: Sempli
•	Material: Lead free crystal
•	Color: Clear
•	Measurements: H 3.75” W 4” D 4”
•	Care: Hand wash

name: Cupa-Stay Coasters Black
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

These laser cut coasters are specifically designed for use with Sempli’s Cupa-Vino glasses and Cupa-Rocks tumblers. They are thoughtfully designed with a slit to hold these rotating glasses in place. Made from a blend of wool and acrylic felt, this set of four features a vibrant black color.

Set includes 4 coasters. 
•	Designer: Daniele 'Danne' Semeraro
•	Brand: Sempli
•	Material: Wool/acrylic felt
•	Color: Black 
•	Measurements: H 0.25” W 4” D 4”

name: Cupa-Lift 2
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

This rustic walnut tray has been precisely CNC cut to fit the barware in Sempli’s Cupa series. Designed to hold two glasses, it features holes tailored to secure the Cupa Glass series conic base. The beautiful piece allows you to carry the stunning barware with ease.

Glasses not included

name: Lux-Multi Pendant
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

With clean lines and inspired craftsmanship, Sempli’s Lux-Multi Pendant light is a contemporary masterpiece. Black fabric cords lead to five spectacular hand-made, lead-free crystal shades. This hard wired light features a canopy with a plated bronze finish and includes 10-watt halogen bulb.

Pendant includes four frosted glass shades and one transparent glass shade. 
Hardwiring required—should be installed by certified electrician. Bronze plated canopy is 10” in diameter. Cord can be adjusted from 1’-10’.
•	DesignerDaniele 'Danne' Semeraro
•	Brand: Sempli
•	Material: Lead free crystal shade
•	Finish: Bronze plated metal
•	Color: Multi
•	Measurements: H 10” W 10” D 10”

Please allow for 4-7 weeks lead time for this item

A black fabric cord leads to a spectacular hand-made, lead-free, frosted crystal shade. This hard-wired light features a canopy with a plated bronze finish and includes a 10-watt halogen bulb.

description:
With clean lines and inspired craftsmanship, Sempli’s Lux-VS single pendant light is a contemporary masterpiece. A black fabric cord leads to a spectacular hand-made, lead-free, frosted crystal shade. This hard-wired light features a canopy with a plated bronze finish and includes a 10-watt halogen bulb.

Hardwiring required. Should be installed by certified electrician. Bronze plated canopy is 5” in diameter. Cord can be adjusted from 1’-10’.
•	Designer: Daniele 'Danne' Semeraro
•	Brand: Sempli
•	Material: Lead free crystal shade
•	Finish: Bronze plated metal
•	Color: White
•	Measurements: H 10” W 5” D 5”

Please allow for 4-7 weeks lead time for this item

name: Paul Pillow
description:
**Shipping Delay. Our office will be closed for the holidays from Dec 23-Jan 6. All orders placed during this time will ship out starting the week of January 7th. For urgent orders, please check our Partners list for a store close to you. 

Jimi Roos' artful doodles are rendered not with a loose-handed pen, but with careful stitches. This pillow line, created in collaboration with Sempli, is hand-embroidered by the designer in his Italian studio using experimental stitching techniques and processes. The resulting variations make each pillow one-of-a-kind. 

Includes one hand-embroidered pillow case and pillow. 
•	Designer: Jimi Roos
•	Brand: jimi roos by Sempli

•	Color: Sand
